name: Fight[2]
description:
Fight scene, Cycle 3, [2/4]

A <blue> <fighter> obssesed with <dark> is charging ahead in unstoppable manner. The <red><figther> is fleeing... This fight is over.

-> This battle was fought and <red><fighter> dominates.

To <enter> this <scene> and get this objkt you have three options in the next 48 hours:

1) Destroy/Burn a <dark> being to get this for free.

2) With each <red><fighter>, that you burn, the primary price for you will be reduced by 1 tez. When done burning, make an offer on objkt.com

3) Collect the scene on primary for 6 tez.

*) Special action: Burn a <blue> <fighter> to reduce the editions of this object by 1 (max to 5)



! The more <scenes> you <enter>, the stronger you are, but more in the future reveal will I. Each  collector of <scene>s can gain levels, which could bring benefits in collecting future fights.

Scene from a live performance from Fireter - a theater of shadow and fire. 

Also a <Scene> where <Blue> <Fighter> wins this <Fight>  
Original NFT from
www.fireter.com
